root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 15-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Regional aggregates:

See Annex 2 – Methodology. It should be noted that for those sub-indicators where there are gaps in the data set, only the countries that reported a complete time series are included in the regional and global aggregates. Annex 2 also shows how the dashboard traffic lights are applied at global and regional level.
